name: Nebula Realms
description:
Welcome to Nebula Realms! Enjoy your stay in this free to play online 3D interactive world where you can socialize, play games and explore our wonderful handcrafted universe.
Express your inner self through your fully customizable avatar and your own decorated home. Invite your friends over and throw a party or engage with them in a public space and share a coffee. Join an event, meet new people, chat with them and become friends!


  • Play for free — Nebula Reals is free, forever. Play with no obligations or strings attached. No purchase is necessary to play, come and visit our realm! What do you have to lose?




  • Never looked so good — Discover thousands of items in our shop. Express yourself or imagine who could you be today and make it happen. Your imagination is the limit!




  • Get noticed — Get ready to become whoever you want to be, desire...to explore every dimension of you, no judgements. Feel comfortable and meet people like you :)




  • Enhance your life — Enjoy decorating your home and personalize every corner of it. Our shop offers hundreds of home decor items to fulfill your dream of having the house you have always imagined. Have your friends to come over and share unforgettable moments.





  • A moment to remember — Feel free to join one of our popular events, expect the unexpected and get surprised by our roleplaying community. Meet new people every day and celebrate life in Nebula Realms!
